column4: a woman had a sudden seizure and died at a massage parlor where she worked at 678
column10: Phnom Penh.------According to sources in the massage parlors
column11: the girl went out with her boyfriend and returned to to work for a few moments before the incident.------The victim was named only as Ly
column12: a 27-year-old.------Authorities examined the body and said excessive drug use resulted in a heart attack.------ ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/305849
